aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text1: Before an accountant, now a Front-End programmer Jr. Born in Cuba but of Galician descent, 4 generations later I return to the land of my great-grandparents
aboutMe.text2: As a good Cuban that I am, I love music and dancing, I enjoy good food, walks through nature and sports.
aboutMe.text3: And since I'm in a new country, what better way to reinvent myself? After completing several courses and studying on my own, I decided to take the plunge and apply to Adalab. What I like the most about programming is that there are no limits to continue learning and growing.
aboutMe.text4: In addition, the tech community is a collaborative and teamwork sector and I am proud to belong to it.

contacto.message: If you want to toch whith me
